reviewText: This is a "must see" for anyone interested in the travels from Spain during the Inquisition to the ultimate arrival in Jerusalem. Narrated and sung in Ladino, Yehoram Gaon gives us a beautiful and heart warming glimpse into the culture and history of the people.

I would, maybe, compare it to Fiddler on the roof.
I liked all of it.
wonderfully.
More about life in old Sepharad.
Very interesting documentary about the Sephardic Jews and narrated by the great singer! Well done! The songs are very nice. It is a great gift for friends and relatives.

I recomend this artist to all the people how likes this kind of history!!

Yoram Gaon genius!!!
We loved very much!
I liked this DVD a lot because it has a lot of tradition and history.  Yehoram Gaon is really talented and sings very beautiful.  I recommend this for those who want to learn Judeo-Spanish.
